page.title: 11Merry Tree Farm.
page.content: This farm is situated off {Miller Lane,Cottom}.A Mr.and Mrs Taylor have rented this farm over the last eleven years.Now they are being forced to leave their farm.Even now they are looking for new premises to restart their business again.The reason they are being moved out is because Lea and Tanterton are merging together as one. The farm covers approximately {50} acres.The land is mainly used for {grazing},there are no vegitables grown on the farm as they discovered there is more profit to be made from animals.The {livestock} consists of fifty dairy cows, eight pigs,twenty five geese,ducks and chickens. The land is being used for housing.Mr.and Mrs.Taylor were quite happy to stay where they were for the rest of their lives,but they have to move on.
